text: Make check payable to: tattoo/san francscq
Payment is Due on Receipt, but no later than the start of research,
Service charges of 2% per month will be assessed on balances more than 30 days past due.
BILLING POLICES: In the event of dient cancellation of a project, all non-car.ccllablc

Projects will be closed out annually.
